meanings.definition: Characterized by excessive movement or activity.
meanings.sent1: The hyperkinetic puppy ran around the yard nonstop.
meanings.sent2: The hyperkinetic child couldn't sit still in class.
meanings.sent3: The hyperkinetic squirrel kept darting back and forth in the park.
meanings.sent4: The hyperkinetic city pulsated with energy and life.
meanings.sent5: The hyperkinetic music filled the room with an electrifying vibe.

meanings.definition: A person who is excessively active or restless.
meanings.sent1: The hyperkinetic at the party was dancing all night long.
meanings.sent2: The hyperkinetic in the office always had a project in hand.
meanings.sent3: The hyperkinetic on the soccer field never stopped moving.
meanings.sent4: The hyperkinetic of the group was like a whirlwind of energy.
meanings.sent5: The hyperkinetic explorer was always on the move, seeking new adventures.
